name: The Chapeau de Paille crew
description: The main protagonist crew led by Monkey D. Luffy, sailing on the Thousand Sunny.

name: Le Roux crew
description: A powerful pirate crew led by Shanks, one of the Four Emperors.

name: The Alvida crew
description: The first pirate crew encountered by Luffy, originally led by Iron Mace Alvida.

name: The Clown Crew
description: Circus-themed pirates led by Buggy the Clown.

name: The Pirates Roger crew
description: The legendary crew of the Pirate King, Gol D. Roger, the only crew to reach Laugh Tale.

name: Captain Usopp's crew
description: A group of three children (Piiman, Ninjin, Tamanegi) led by Usopp in Syrup Village.

name: The Black Cat crew
description: An East Blue crew formerly led by Captain Kuro, known for scheming and cat themes.

name: Don Krieg's Pirate Armada
description: The largest pirate fleet in the East Blue, led by Don Krieg.

name: Les Cuisiniers crew
description: The crew led by Zeff before he retired to open the Baratie restaurant.

name: The Arlong crew
description: A crew of Fish-Men led by Arlong who occupied the Conomi Islands.

name: The Pirates Yes crew
description: A minor pirate crew captured by Smoker in Loguetown.

name: The Rumbar crew
description: Brook's former music-loving crew, wiped out in the Florian Triangle.

name: The Giant Crew
description: A legendary crew of giants from Elbaf led by Dorry and Brogy.

name: The Bliking crew
description: The crew formed by Wapol after fleeing the Drum Kingdom.

name: The Tulip crew
description: A minor pirate crew led by Yurika.

name: Whitebeard's crew
description: The massive fleet led by Edward Newgate, formerly the strongest man in the world.

name: Primate League
description: An alliance led by Mont Blanc Cricket searching for the Sky Islands.

name: the New Age crew
description: Led by Bellamy the Hyena, they ridiculed dreams and served Doflamingo.

name: The Roshio crew
description: Led by Roshio the Executioner, defeated by Bellamy in Mock Town.

name: Don Quixote's crew
description: A powerful criminal organization led by Donquixote Doflamingo that ruled Dressrosa.

name: Blackbeard's crew
description: Led by Marshall D. Teach, focusing on hunting powerful Devil Fruits.

name: The Fanged Toad crew
description: A pirate crew defeated by Foxy in a Davy Back Fight.

name: The Foxy crew
description: Pirates specializing in the Davy Back Fight games, led by Foxy the Silver Fox.

name: The Gros Casques crew
description: The Big Helmet Pirates, led by Mikazuki.

name: The Sun Pirates crew
description: Formed by Fisher Tiger with freed Fish-Man slaves, later led by Jimbei.

name: Space Pirate
description: Extraterrestrial pirates encountered by Enel on the Moon.

name: Thriller Bark
description: The crew of Warlord Gecko Moria, utilizing zombies and shadows.

name: The crew of the Rolling
description: Pirates led by Charlotte Lola found in the Florian Triangle.

name: The Marquereaux crew
description: The Macro Pirates, a group of kidnappers formerly associated with Arlong.

name: The Hearth crew
description: The Heart Pirates, led by Trafalgar Law, utilizing a yellow submarine.

name: The Kid crew
description: A violent crew led by Eustass Kid, known for high civilian casualties.

name: The Hawkins crew
description: Led by Basil Hawkins, who relies on tarot cards and voodoo magic.

name: Drake's crew
description: Led by X Drake, an undercover Marine officer.

name: The On-Air crew
description: Longarm Tribe pirates led by Scratchmen Apoo.

name: Bonney's crew
description: Led by Jewelry Bonney, the Glutton.

name: The Fire Tank crew
description: A mafia-style pirate crew led by Capone Bege.

name: The crew of Les Moines Dépravés
description: The Fallen Monk Pirates led by Urouge from the Sky Islands.

name: The Kuja Pirates crew
description: An all-female crew from Amazon Lily led by Boa Hancock.

name: The Spade crew
description: Portgas D. Ace's first pirate crew before he joined Whitebeard.

name: The crew of Barbe Brune
description: The Brownbeard Pirates, active in the New World and Punk Hazard.

name: The Hundred Beasts crew
description: The massive army led by Kaido, comprised largely of artificial Zoan users.

name: The crew of the Lion d'Or
description: Led by the legendary pirate Shiki the Golden Lion.

name: The Bluejam crew
description: East Blue pirates who worked for the nobility in the Goa Kingdom.

name: The ASL crew
description: The childhood brotherhood of Ace, Sabo, and Luffy.

name: Faux Equipage du Chapeau de Paille
description: A group of impostors led by Demaro Black who impersonated Luffy's crew.

name: The Caribou crew
description: Rookie pirates led by the brothers Caribou and Coribou.

name: The New Fishmen crew
description: An extremist group led by Hody Jones aiming to conquer Fish-Man Island.

name: The Flying Pirates crew
description: Led by Vander Decken IX aboard the Flying Dutchman.

name: Gyro's crew
description: A pirate crew from the South Blue led by Gyro, defeated by Hody Jones.

name: Big Mom's crew
description: A massive crew ruled by Charlotte Linlin consisting largely of her children.

name: The Expedition crew
description: Buggy's Pirate Dispatch Organization, a mercenary guild.

name: The Magnificent Pirates crew
description: Led by Cavendish of the White Horse, part of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

name: Bartolomeo's crew
description: The Barto Club, a crew of Straw Hat fanatics led by Bartolomeo.

name: Fleet Yonta Maria
description: A massive fleet led by Orlumbus, part of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

name: The crew of the Moon Crescent
description: Led by Mikazuki, they were easily defeated by the Galley-La shipwrights.

name: The Diez Barrels crew
description: Led by Diez Barrels (Drake's father), they attempted to sell the Ope Ope no Mi.

name: XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliances
description: A group of martial artists led by Ideo, part of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

name: New Giant Crew
description: A pirate crew of giants led by Hajrudin, part of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

name: The Rocks crew
description: A legendary crew led by Rocks D. Xebec that included Big Mom, Kaido, and Whitebeard.

name: the Ganzack crew
description: The main antagonist crew from the OVA 'Defeat the Pirate Ganzack!'.

name: The Amigo crew
description: Led by Largo, they appeared in the Little East Blue anime filler arc.

name: The Phoenix crew
description: Led by Puzzle, they appeared in the Ice Hunter anime filler arc.

name: Bayan's crew
description: Pirates appearing in the 'Great Gold Pirate' TV special.

name: The Schneider Pirates crew
description: Led by Schneider, mentioned in the 'Dead End Adventure' movie.

name: The Wetton crew
description: Led by Wetton, they dominated Ruluka Island in an anime filler arc.

name: Pumpkin Pirates
description: A group of children trapped in the Rainbow Mist in an anime filler arc.

name: The Trump Pirates crew
description: Led by Bear King, antagonists of the 'Clockwork Island Adventure' movie.

name: Gasparde's crew
description: Led by Gasparde, former Marine turned pirate, from 'Dead End Adventure'.

name: Zenny's crew
description: Led by Zenny, a money-lender pirate from an anime filler arc.

name: The Pirates du Sables crew
description: The Sand Pirates, a desert crew from the Alabasta filler episodes.

name: The Pirates Treasure crew
description: Led by Mad Treasure, treasure hunters from the 'Heart of Gold' special.

name: Baroque Works
description: A secret criminal organization led by Crocodile attempting to seize Alabasta.

name: Royaume de Luvneel
description: The Lvneel Kingdom in the North Blue, home of Mont Blanc Noland.

name: La Flotte de Happou
description: The Happo Navy, a naval force from Kano Country led by the Chinjao Family.

name: L'Équipage des Maquereaux
description: The Macro Pirates (see 'The Marquereaux crew').

name: Marine
description: The World Government's military sea force responsible for law enforcement.

name: Dragon Célestes
description: The World Nobles, descendants of the founders of the World Government.

name: L'Équipage de Mad Treasure
description: See 'The Pirates Treasure crew' (Item 77).

name: Royaume de Tontatta
description: The hidden kingdom of the Tontatta Tribe (dwarves) on Green Bit.

name: Armarda du Chapeau de Paille
description: The Straw Hat Grand Fleet, an alliance of seven crews serving under Luffy.

name: Baggy's Delivery
description: A pirate mercenary guild organized and led by Buggy the Clown.

name: Buggy's Delivery
description: Duplicate entry for Buggy's Delivery (Baggy's Delivery).

name: Cipher Pol
description: Secret intelligence agencies of the World Government (CP0-CP9).

name: Enies Lobby
description: The 'Judicial Island', one of the World Government's three main strongholds.

name: Impel Down
description: The World Government's maximum-security underwater prison.

name: Royaume de Goa
description: A kingdom in the East Blue where Luffy, Ace, and Sabo grew up.

name: Village de Shimotsuki
description: A village in the East Blue where Zoro trained at his dojo.

name: Archipel des Argao
description: The Organ Archipelago, a location in the East Blue.

name: Île des animaux étranges
description: The Island of Rare Animals, guarded by Gaimon.

name: Archipel des Gecko
description: The Gecko Islands, home to Syrup Village and Usopp.

name: Baratie
description: A sea-going restaurant ship run by Zeff and Sanji's former workplace.

name: Archipel Conomi
description: The Conomi Islands, home to Nami's Cocoyasi Village.

name: Loguetown
description: The town of the beginning and the end, where Roger was executed.

name: Royaume de Lvneel
description: See 'Royaume de Luvneel' (Item 79).

name: Baterilla
description: An island in the South Blue where Rouge lived and Ace was born.

name: Royaume maléfique de Black Drum
description: The new kingdom established by Wapol in the South Blue.

name: Ohara
description: An island of archaeologists in the West Blue, destroyed by a Buster Call.

name: Pays des fleurs
description: Kano Country (Land of Flowers) in the West Blue, home to the Happo Navy.

name: Reverse Mountain
description: The mountain entrance to the Grand Line where currents flow upward.

name: Île aux cactus
description: Whisky Peak, an island shaped like cactus mountains inhabited by bounty hunters.

name: Little Garden
description: A prehistoric island where the giants Dorry and Brogy dueled for a century.

name: Île de Drum
description: A winter island known for its advanced medicine and pink snow, Chopper's home.

name: Alabasta
description: A desert kingdom in the Grand Line ruled by the Nefertari family.

name: Long Ring Long Land
description: An archipelago of islands connected by land bridges during low tide.

name: Water Seven
description: The metropolis of water, famous for its shipwrights and the Sea Train.

name: Archipel des Sabaody
description: A mangrove archipelago and the final stop before the New World.

name: Archipel de Boing
description: The Boin Archipelago, a series of giant carnivorous plants where Usopp trained.

name: Erbaf
description: Elbaf, the kingdom of giants in the New World.

name: Pays des Wa
description: Wano Country, a samurai nation isolated from the world.

name: Punk Hazard
description: An island half-frozen and half-burning, site of the Akainu vs. Aokiji duel.

name: Dressrosa
description: The Kingdom of Love and Passion, ruled by Doflamingo before his defeat.

name: Green Bit
description: An island north of Dressrosa inhabited by the Tontatta Tribe.

name: Zo
description: Zou, a moving island located on the back of the giant elephant Zunesha.

name: Royaume de Prodence
description: The Prodence Kingdom, ruled by Elizabello II.

name: Royaume de Mogalo
description: The Mogaro Kingdom, home of the Funk Brothers.

name: Royaume de Germa
description: The Germa Kingdom, a seafaring nation without land ruled by the Vinsmoke family.

name: Sphinx
description: Whitebeard's home village, currently protected by Marco.

name: Skypiea
description: A Sky Island located on the White-White Sea.

name: Weatheria
description: A sky island focused on weather science where Nami trained.

name: Île des hommes-poissons
description: Fish-Man Island, located underwater directly beneath the Red Line.

name: La lune
description: The Moon (Fairy Vearth), where Enel established a new kingdom.

name: Armée Révolutionnaire
description: A powerful military organization led by Monkey D. Dragon fighting the World Government.

name: Anciens membres du Baroque Works
description: Former agents of Crocodile's organization.

name: Anciens membres du Cipher Pol
description: Former agents of the World Government's intelligence agencies.

name: Anciens membres de la Marine
description: Former marines who have resigned or defected (e.g., Aokiji).

name: Esclave
description: Individuals enslaved by the World Nobles or pirates.

name: IÎle de la couronne
description: Crown Island, setting of the 'Chopper's Kingdom on the Island of Strange Animals' movie.

name: Île d'Asuka
description: Asuka Island, setting of 'The Cursed Holy Sword' movie.

name: Île de Mecha
description: Mecha Island, setting of 'The Giant Mechanical Soldier of Karakuri Castle' movie.

name: Néo Marine
description: A radical splinter group of the Marines led by Zephyr (Film Z).

name: Gran Tesero
description: A massive golden ship and entertainment city led by Gild Tesoro (Film Gold).

name: Elegia
description: The Island of Music, setting of 'One Piece Film: Red'.

name: World Economic Journal
description: The primary newspaper publishing agency in the world, led by Morgans.

name: Cap des Jumeaux
description: Twin Cape, the lighthouse located at the exit of Reverse Mountain.

name: Equipage de Bellamy
description: Duplicate/Translated entry for the Bellamy Pirates.
